barehand_moves.name: Throat Punch
barehand_moves.effect: Reduces target’s accuracy by 10% for 1 round

barehand_moves.name: Snare Trap
barehand_moves.effect: Immobilizes target for 2 rounds if they fail a DEX check

barehand_moves.name: Swift Dodge
barehand_moves.effect: Increases user’s dodge chance by 30% for the next round

barehand_moves.name: Psychic Assault
barehand_moves.effect: Reduces target’s sanity by 2 on a successful hit
